manifest_name.description: Public title that shows up in the list of extensions the user has installed.

manifest_description.description: Description that shows up in the list of extensions the user has installed.

devtools_tabname.description: The tab that shows up in the chrome devtools

tabs_componenttree.description: Tab inside the inspector that shows the tree of components that make up the application.

tabs_performance.description: Tab inside the inspector that shows the panel which measures the time taken to create components.

tabs_transactions.description: Tab inside the inspector that shows data on communication with the server. We've called these transactions since it is grouping of measures for a feature.

tabs_eventlog.description: Tab inside the inspector that shows all the events that are being fired and handled.

tabs_actions.description: Tab inside the inspector that shows all the actions. Actions are calls to functionality on the server.

tabs_storage.description: Tab inside the inspector that shows what we're storing and caching on the different client side data stores.

tabs_help.description: Tooltip for the dropdown that shows links to different portions of documentation.

menu_refresh.description: Button that refreshes the information for the current tab.

menu_record.description: Button that toggles whether we care about the current operations happening on the page.

menu_filter.description: Label for the box that limits what is displayed in the tab

componenttree_menu_expandall.description: A button that shows all the available information by showing the hidden children.

componenttree_menu_showids.description: Button that toggles the display of the unique id in the panel for every component in the tree that has one.

performance_menu_showcollected.description: While recording, we don't show what we have collected. The button associated with this label will show what we recorded without stopping recording.

eventlog_menu_appevents.description: A filter label which toggles visibility of events that have a type of APPLICATION.

eventlog_menu_cmpevents.description: A filter label which toggles visibility of events that have a type of COMPONENT.

eventlog_menu_unhandled.description: A filter which toggles events that were fired, but were not handled and had no effect.

eventlog_menu_appevents_tooltip.description: The tooltip of the application events filter button.

eventlog_menu_cmpevents_tooltip.description: The tooltip of the component events filter button.

eventlog_menu_unhandled_tooltip.description: The tooltip of the Unhandled filter button.

actions_menu_storable.description: Button that filters all the actions collected on whether they are storable (can be saved locally and not retrieved each time.)

actions_menu_cached.description: Button that filters all the actions collected on whether the action was cached.

actions_menu_background.description: Button that filters all the actions on whether they were executed in the background.

actions_menu_success.description: Button that filters the actions on whether they were successfully sent and executed on the server.

actions_menu_incomplete.description: Button that filters actions on whether they were sent to the server but no response was received.

actions_menu_error.description: Button that filters actions on whether an Error occured sending the action.

actions_menu_aborted.description: Button that filters actions on whether the Action was prevented from being sent to the client.

actions_menu_record_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the actions recording button. We only track actions while this is enabled.

actions_menu_storable_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the actions storable filter.

actions_menu_cached_tooltip.message: Show storable actions served from cache
actions_menu_cached_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the actions cache filter.

actions_menu_background_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the background actions filter.

actions_menu_success_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the successfull actions filter.

actions_menu_incomplete_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the incomplete actions filter.

actions_menu_error_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the errored actions filter.

actions_menu_aborted_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the aborted actions filter.

actions_section_pendingoverrides.description: Heading for the section which contains the actions that are being overridden by the inspector.

actions_section_pendingoverrides_descrip.message: Drag actions here. Next time we see action with same name, we will either drop it, send back modified response, or error response.
actions_section_pendingoverrides_descrip.description: Helper text which describes to the user how to use the pending overrides section.

actions_section_processedoverrides.description: Header for the section which contains the actions that were overridden.

actions_section_pending.description: Header for the section which lists the actions that are waiting to be sent to the server.

actions_section_running.description: Header for the section which lists the actions that have been sent to the server but have not yet completed.

actions_section_completed.description: Header for the section which lists all the actions that have completed and had their callback functions called.

transactions_id.description: Unique identifier for a transaction (grouping of instrumentation data)

transactions_starttime.description: The amount of time in seconds since the page loaded when the transaction started.

transactions_duration.description: How long in milliseconds the transaction was in process.

transactions_context.description: Contextual information for the transaction passed by the transaction author.

transactions_actions.description: Count of the actions that occurred during the transaction.

transactions_xhrs.description: Count of the XmlHttpRequest calls (server connections) that occured during the length of this transaction.

transactions_starttime_info.description: Start time label that describes what the column data means.

transactions_duration_info.description: Duration information that describes that the column is in milliseconds.

eventcard_parameters.description: Label showing the information sent along with an event.

eventcard_caller.description: Label showing which function fired this event.

eventcard_source.description: Which component was responsible for firing the event.

eventcard_duration.description: How long it took for this event to execute.

eventcard_handledby.description: Which components reacted to the firing of this event.

eventcard_togglegrid.description: Button label that opens up a grid that details the call graph of this event and it's ancestors / descendants.

actioncard_state.description: The current status of the action. Values include SUCCESS, ERROR, ABORT, INCOMPLETE.

actioncard_background.description: Was this action executed in the background.

actioncard_created.description: How many components were created as a result of this action.

actioncard_storablesize.description: What is the size of the stored action.

actioncard_storablerefresh.description: Did this refresh the storage entry?

actioncard_storablecachehit.description: Did this retrieve the result from the Storage or did from the server?

actioncard_storablekey.description: Unique key for this action entry in storage.

actioncard_removeaction.description: Assistive text for the remove button on actions when in the pending or processed overrides sections.

actioncard_parameters.description: Data sent to the server as part of this action call.

actioncard_error.description: If an error was returned, shows the value here.

actioncard_dropaction.description: Option which would prevent the action from being sent to the server.

actioncard_overrideresult.description: Option which would allow you to specify a different return value from the server.

actioncard_errorresponse.description: Option which allows you to specify that the action should result in an error of a type you can specify.

actioncard_key.description: When specifying the override, this is the key of that result.

actioncard_newvalue.description: When specifying the override, this is the body of that result.

actioncard_errormessage.description: When specifying the action should throw an error, this is the error message it should throw.

actioncard_errorstack.description: When specifying the action should throw an error, this is the stack trace for the error it should throw.

componentview_globalid.description: Unique Global ID of the component you are inspecting

componentview_isrendered.description: Is this component rendered and added to the HTML page.

componentview_descriptor.description: The type of component in the form markup://namespace:componentname

componentview_elements.description: How many html elements this component and all its children have generated.

componentview_rerendered.description: How many times this element has rerendered.

componentview_avpfvp.description: Where references get their values from. Facets and Attributes can resolve their references against different components sometimes. This label is used when attributes and facets get their references from the same component.

componentview_avp.description: Where you resolve your attribute references against.

componentview_fvp.description: Where you resolve your references in facets against. Facets are collections of other components passed to your component.

componentview_model.description: A model is another collection of properties on your component, most likely coming from the server.

componentview_super.description: The component that the current component has extended.

componentview_handlers.description: Shows the events on the component that are being listened to and what function would be executed when the handler is hit.

chaosview_samplingInterval_in_second.description: how many seconds between two clicking

chaosview_drop_action_by_percentage.description: drop action randomly, by some percentage

chaosview_buton_stop_all_runs.description: push this to force all chaos run to stop

chaosview_new_chaos_run.description: area for buttons on start/stop/save a new chaos run

chaosview_button_start.description: push this to start a new chaos run

chaosview_button_stop.description: push this to stop the new chaos run

chaosview_button_save.description: push this to save the new chaos run

chaosview_old_chaos_run.description: area for buttons on replaying existing chaos run

chaosview_button_cancel.description: push this to clear up the loaded chaos run

chaosview_button_replay.description: push this to replay the saved chaos run

chaosview_chaos_run_result.description: area for chaos run status update
